pullRequest.title: KOGITO-1473 - Import DMN test scenario runner in KOGITO
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.redhat.com/browse/KOGITO-1473
This PR introduces a wrapper of test scenario runner to make it possible to execute scesim file via JUnit runner (DMN only).
NOTE: it works with JUnit 5 vintage engine
Content details:

updated DMNKogito to preserve DMN resource path (@tarilabs FYI)
created kogito-scenario-simulation module
cloned XStreamUtils, HasImports, Import and Imports to avoid kie-soup dependency
created KogitoDMNScenarioRunner, KogitoDMNScenarioRunnerHelper and KogitoJunitActivator to remove KieContainer usage (it is still in method signature for now but it is not used)

@evacchi @yesamer @jomarko

nodes.bodyText:
I think we should not make another copy. We have already one in drools-core, be exact org.drools.core.util.XStreamUtils.
One more reason, most copied methods are deprecated, some also with linked CVE. I think we need to start think of some utils module used both by kogito and non kogito world..
If we won't introduce general module, we should update year

nodes.bodyText: Are these dmn and scesim files just for manual testing, are you going some unit tests?

nodes.bodyText:
Could we add some comment here?
For example:
/**

KogitoJunitActivator is a custom extension of JUnit's
which provides functionality of the Drools Scenario Simulation
to standard JUnit tests by means of the
Dmn context and associated support classes and annotations.
*/
